title: Handle a Claim with Disputing Beneficiaries (Interpleader)
description: Two beneficiaries of a life insurance policy are disputing who should receive the proceeds.

tasks.description: Receive notice that the beneficiaries are disputing the claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: The claims examiner is notified of the dispute.

tasks.description: Notify the legal department of the dispute.
tasks.expected_outcome: The examiner escalates the case to the company's legal team.

tasks.description: Following legal advice, file an interpleader action, depositing the policy proceeds with the court and allowing the court to decide the rightful recipient.
tasks.expected_outcome: The company pays the funds to the court, removing itself from the dispute between the beneficiaries.
